ValidationRule.description: The field Lost Detail & Lost Detail2 or Disqualified Reason are required before closing an Ardius Ticket.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.DeveloperName == "Ardius" && ISPICKVAL(Status__c , "Lost") && !( !ISPICKVAL(Disqualified_Reason__c, "") || ( !ISPICKVAL(Lost_Detail__c, "") && ( !ISPICKVAL(Lost_Detail2__c, "") || ISPICKVAL(Lost_Detail__c, "Out of business") || ISPICKVAL(Lost_Detail__c, "Account suspended") || ISPICKVAL(Lost_Detail__c, "Disqualified by CSM") || ISPICKVAL(Lost_Detail__c, "Duplicate") ) ) ) && !$User.Exempt_from_Validation_Rules__c
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please Select a Lost Detail and Lost Detail 2 or a Disqualified Reason Before Closing the Ticket.
